/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape. Cars and bicycles are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the daily life and movement in the city. In the distance, a large white building with a red roof stands out, adding a touch of architectural diversity to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, completing the picturesque view of this worldwide landmark.
